segments.text: Hello , Mr . Brown , long time no see . Where have you been ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I went on a holiday in the city of Chende .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . What do you think of it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The city is small , not very modern , but there are many mountains with lots of trees around the city , so the air there is pretty fresh .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you go to the Summer Mountain Resort ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly ! The most attractive place is that , it's very large ; it is 8 times the size of Forbidden City and 16 times the size of Summer Palace . The art of gardens is perfectly represented in it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It sounds great , and is it really cool there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I think the reason is that there is a big lake , and many trees in the Resort .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What is the special local product ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The main product of Chende is various kinds of ferine mushroom and the almond . The mushroom tastes really good , and it is very different from the common mushrooms , and the snack made of almond is delicious .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope to go there someday .
segments.speaker: S1
